website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Cloudride DMX 3.0 was lauded as a cozy and lightweight walking shoe for daily wear. The buyers also appreciated the quality-price ratio of the product. However, a considerable number of users were not able to benefit from the trainer because it fit too small and narrow. Some people also disfavored the “rubber ball” in the heel section of the sole. But in the end, many owners still recommended it because of the comfort it delivered.
pros: Many users agreed that the Reebok Cloudride DMX 3.0 was comfortable for casual wear
The trainer felt light and soft on the foot, according to most reviewers
A number of buyers considered it to be a quality shoe for a reasonable price
cons: Some purchasers complained that the footwear ran small and narrow than what they expected
This walking shoe lacked support and felt unstable, according to several wearers
A few users griped about the ball-like structure in the heel portion as it pushed the foot to slide forward and put pressure on the toes

customer_reviews.title: Great value with comfort that's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.text: What an amazingly comfortable shoe! I've slept on pillows that weren't as plush as these shoes, but with that said I've also had pillows that would have made for a better looking shoe than these, ha. Looks of course are subjective and I wasn't quite sold on the looks before purchasing but bought them anyway because I knew that Reebok's DMX line of shoes are hard to beat when it comes to plush comfort right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Yes Of Course Naturally

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable for walking...but a tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I walked 30 miles in these shoes over 5 days and had no discomfort. Lightweight and breathable with unique air cushions in the sole. I did have to send back the first pair because they run snug. I usually wear a 10.5 but needed an 11 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Genard Madorin

customer_reviews.title: Need break in period
customer_reviews.text: When i first put these on it felt like there was a heel on the shoe. But that was the DMX cushioning. These are very cushy and the upper material is soft. But i needed more support so I put in a slim insole for my arches. After that these work fine.
customer_reviews.author: bballer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe; but is the best considering that I got it on sale.
customer_reviews.text: For a true DMX shoe that is on sale, this is fantastic. Just one note though, the non-flat sole makes it feel that you are unbalanced. it will take time and thread wear to flatten it out. Meanwhile, it feels smaller that it seems. Therefore, get a bigger size than usual. Once again, I got it on sale so it WELL WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Super Pogi

customer_reviews.title: Was hard to adapt but I got it now
customer_reviews.text: It has been difficult for me to adapt to the new shoes. I knew it could take some time and now I think I got it but it takes too much time. First was a blister in my left foot just behind the heel. The other day there was a blister in the base of my right heel but I was interchanging my older shoes with the new ones and it helped me to continue with my morning walkies.
customer_reviews.author: William Bernal

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: as usual good quality, very comfortable for walking as was main purpose when buying
customer_reviews.author: Sergiy M.

customer_reviews.title: Good desing and poor comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I need wear it with thin sox. Beacuse is smaller than i expected. And shoes soles is not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Looks GREAT on me!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes make me look even better than I do now! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lenc3483

customer_reviews.title: Probably a fake
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfiness and shoe style. However, I find this upsetting because I have friend who took a look at the Reebok shoes and said they are a fake. Made in China. He tells me I should be careful buying a copycat shoes that made from a different country. Also claimed that these are not the original.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rod

customer_reviews.title: Big heel, not feeling the cushion like a runtone shoe
customer_reviews.text: Still breaking in. Heel on these shoes raised a little. Comfort is good so far. Really thin profile
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: These shows are very comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy and they are a dream to walk on.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent L. Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable show, the shoe I found to be more comfortable was the Reebok jet fuse. Wish I could find that shoe again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I will use it for work. Those shoes are comfortable and good.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit is as expected and I very comfortable. Good !!
customer_reviews.author: ricky1328

customer_reviews.title: I love this product it's good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and very very comfortable I will be getting some more in a different color. It is my go to shoes to go on vacation or anywhere I want to walk for a long time. Truly amazing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe at a Reebok store and the shoe looks great but it has horrible arch support. It can really be a nightmare to wear depending on your foot shape.
customer_reviews.author: VA reader

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Liked this product so well I just purchased a second pair. I am on my feet all day and cushioning and breathability are at the top of my list. These shoes have this in abundance. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sithlord

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Cloudride DMX 3.0 Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Materials: Mesh upper for breathability. Low-cut design for freedom of motion and quicker transitions. Best for: Walking, everyday comfort. Memory Tech sockliner and super soft foam adds cushioning. Rubber outsole for lasting durability. DMX Flex technology allows air to flow from heel to toe with each step creating custom cushioning. Low-profile lug design for traction
